reviewText: Just like being on vacation in the Smokies without the crowds of people.  Lovely footage and it really is a relaxing dvd.  Very nice photography and sounds.

I really enjoyed the way the DVD takes you through the park. I traveled to the Smokies a lot growing up and this was a perfect reminder. You can watvch with just nature sounds as well as music. Very relaxing!
I thought this would be a good reminder of our trips  to the mountains but it turned out to be  just pictures that I could found on the internet
